DOC.brief_summary: This study 6 healthy male subject , receive single oral dose 100 mg [ 14C ] -radiolabeled GLPG0634 . Furthermore , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) main metabolite plasma relative GLPG0634 evaluate . This study also provide safety tolerability information GLPG0634 .
